entity.name: Chris Sununu
entity.description: US governor of New Hampshire, Chris Sununu

text: @BenJKest Gov Sununu, NH. I’d say he could be more strict with closures during the pandemic. Daycares are open, hairdressers open,etc.  Restaurants are take out only.  My husband d I are being extra careful on our own.
